data.note: Day To Day (Ankle) - The Rockets listed Crawford as Questionable for Friday's (Oct. 24) game against the Pistons.
Out (Ankle) - The Rockets listed Finney-Smith as Out for Friday's (Oct. 24) game against the Pistons.
Day To Day (Ankle) - The Rockets listed Tate as Questionable for Friday's (Oct. 24) game against the Pistons.
Out For Season (ACL) - The Rockets said on Monday (Sept. 22) that VanVleet suffered a torn ACL and may be out for the entire 2025-26 campaign, per Shams Charania of ESPN.
